ayahs.indonesian: Dia (Muhammad) bermuka masam dan berpaling,
ayahs.english: He frowned and turned away.

ayahs.indonesian: karena telah datang seorang buta kepadanya.
ayahs.english: Because there came to him the blind man, [interrupting].

ayahs.indonesian: Tahukah kamu barangkali dia ingin membersihkan dirinya (dari dosa),
ayahs.english: But what would make you perceive, [O Muhammad], that perhaps he might be purified.

ayahs.indonesian: atau dia (ingin) mendapatkan pengajaran, lalu pengajaran itu memberi manfaat kepadanya?
ayahs.english: Or be reminded and the remembrance would benefit him?

ayahs.indonesian: Adapun orang yang merasa dirinya serba cukup,
ayahs.english: As for he who thinks himself without need,

ayahs.indonesian: maka kamu melayaninya.
ayahs.english: To him you give attention.

ayahs.indonesian: Padahal tidak ada (celaan) atasmu kalau dia tidak membersihkan diri (beriman).
ayahs.english: And not upon you [is any blame] if he will not be purified.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan adapun orang yang datang kepadamu dengan bersegera (untuk mendapatkan pengajaran),
ayahs.english: But as for he who came to you striving [for knowledge]

ayahs.indonesian: sedang dia takut kepada (Allah),
ayahs.english: While he fears [Allah],

ayahs.indonesian: maka kamu mengabaikannya.
ayahs.english: From him you are distracted.

ayahs.indonesian: Sekali-kali jangan (begitu)! Sungguh, (ayat-ayat Allah) itu suatu peringatan,
ayahs.english: No! Indeed, these verses are a reminder;

ayahs.indonesian: maka barang siapa menghendaki, tentulah dia memperhatikannya.
ayahs.english: So whoever wills may remember it.

ayahs.indonesian: (Itulah) lembaran-lembaran yang dimuliakan,
ayahs.english: [It is recorded] in honored sheets,

ayahs.indonesian: yang ditinggikan (dan) disucikan,
ayahs.english: Exalted and purified,

ayahs.indonesian: di tangan para utusan (malaikat),
ayahs.english: Carried by the hands of messenger-angels,

ayahs.indonesian: yang mulia lagi berbakti.
ayahs.english: Noble and dutiful.

ayahs.indonesian: Binasalah manusia; alangkah sangat kufurnya dia!
ayahs.english: Cursed is man; how disbelieving is he.

ayahs.indonesian: Dari apakah Allah menciptakannya?
ayahs.english: From what substance did He create him?

ayahs.indonesian: Dari setetes mani, Dia menciptakannya lalu menentukannya.
ayahs.english: From a sperm-drop He created him and destined for him;

ayahs.indonesian: Kemudian Dia memudahkan jalannya;
ayahs.english: Then He eased the way for him;

ayahs.indonesian: kemudian Dia mematikannya dan memasukkannya ke dalam kubur,
ayahs.english: Then He causes his death and provides a grave for him.

ayahs.indonesian: kemudian apabila Dia menghendaki, Dia membangkitkannya kembali.
ayahs.english: Then when He wills, He will resurrect him.

ayahs.indonesian: Sekali-kali jangan! Manusia itu belum melaksanakan apa yang diperintahkan Allah kepadanya.
ayahs.english: No! Man has not yet accomplished what He commanded him.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka hendaklah manusia memperhatikan makanannya.
ayahs.english: Then let mankind look at his food—

ayahs.indonesian: Kami benar-benar telah mencurahkan air (dari langit),
ayahs.english: How We poured down water in torrents,

ayahs.indonesian: kemudian Kami belah bumi dengan sebaik-baiknya,
ayahs.english: Then We broke open the earth, splitting [it with sprouts],

ayahs.indonesian: lalu Kami tumbuhkan biji-bijian di bumi itu,
ayahs.english: And caused to grow within it grain

ayahs.indonesian: dan buah anggur dan sayur-sayuran,
ayahs.english: And grapes and herbage

ayahs.indonesian: dan zaitun dan kurma,
ayahs.english: And olive and palm trees

ayahs.indonesian: dan kebun-kebun (yang) lebat,
ayahs.english: And gardens of dense shrubbery

ayahs.indonesian: dan buah-buahan serta rumput-rumputan,
ayahs.english: And fruit and grass—

ayahs.indonesian: untuk kesenanganmu dan untuk hewan-hewan ternakmu.
ayahs.english: [As] enjoyment for you and your grazing livestock.

ayahs.indonesian: Maka apabila datang suara yang memekakkan (tiupan sangkakala yang kedua),
ayahs.english: But when there comes the Deafening Blast—

ayahs.indonesian: pada hari ketika seseorang lari dari saudaranya,
ayahs.english: On the Day a man will flee from his brother

ayahs.indonesian: dan dari ibu dan bapaknya,
ayahs.english: And his mother and his father

ayahs.indonesian: dan dari istri dan anak-anaknya.
ayahs.english: And his wife and his children,

ayahs.arabic: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
ayahs.transliteration: Likulli imri-in minhum yawma-ithin shaanun yughneehi
ayahs.indonesian: Setiap orang dari mereka pada hari itu mempunyai urusan yang menyibukkannya.
ayahs.english: For every man, that Day, will be a matter adequate for him.

ayahs.indonesian: Banyak muka pada hari itu berseri-seri,
ayahs.english: [Some] faces, that Day, will be bright—

ayahs.indonesian: tertawa dan bergembira ria,
ayahs.english: Laughing, rejoicing at good news.

ayahs.indonesian: Dan banyak (pula) muka pada hari itu tertutup debu,
ayahs.english: And [other] faces, that Day, will have upon them dust.

ayahs.indonesian: ditutup oleh kegelapan.
ayahs.english: Blackness will cover them.

ayahs.indonesian: Mereka itulah orang-orang kafir lagi durhaka.
ayahs.english: Those are the disbelievers, the wicked ones.
